name: The Twilight Adventures In Up and Down
name_original: The Twilight Adventures In Up and Down
description:
The Twilight Adventures in Up and Down

is a 2x2D, self co-operative adventure platformer. Where you play as Eve and Dodo to travel through the worlds. Switching between the characters and flipping elements between the dimensions.

Keyboard controls

ActionKeyboardXbox game padJumpSpaceA
MoveWASD, Arrow keysD-pad, L analog stickInteractEXFlip worldFLBSwitch CharacterCRB

Created by

  • Oscar Oders 
  • Petter Svensson 
  • Jesper Uddefors 
  • Sebastian Nilsson 
  • Ulrik Bergström
